response:
reasoning='Step 1: Architecture: We implement a single-stage folded-cascode OTA with an NMOS differential input pair (M1/M2), PMOS folding devices (Pf1/Pf2), and a cascode current-mirror load (Pf3–Pf5). 
Step 2: Biasing: The IB=10uA port (ibn10u) feeds a diode-connected NMOS Mbias (W=20u/L=1.8u) to generate a stable gate bias for the PMOS folding transistors. 
Step 3: Input sizing: M1/M2 are sized W=500u/L=1.8u to maximize gm for high DC gain; tail transistor Mtail (W=20u/L=1.8u) sinks the 10uA into VSS. 
Step 4: Folding devices: Pf1/Pf2 are PMOS (W=60u/L=1.8u) with their gates tied to the bias node (ibn10u). 
Step 5: Load mirror: Pf3 (diode-connected reference, W=120u), Pf4 (mirror, W=120u), and Pf5 (output cascode, W=240u) all at L=1.8u provide high output impedance for >60dB gain. 
Step 6: Technology lock: All NMOS use model tsmc18dN; all PMOS use model tsmc18dP. 
Step 7: Netlist formatting: The final Spectre netlist strictly follows the required header comments, subckt definition (using ports VDD, VSS, ibn10u, vin, vip, vout), transistor instantiations referencing vin/vip/vout directly, the "ends fc_ota" line, and the exact footer with top-level instantiation.' config=ConfigFile(netlist='// Library name: MP4
// Cell name: fc_ota
// View name: schematic
subckt fc_ota VDD VSS ibn10u vin vip vout
    Mbias  (ibn10u ibn10u VSS VSS)         tsmc18dN w=20u   l=1.8u
    M1     (neta   vip   net_tail VSS)    tsmc18dN w=500u  l=1.8u
    M2     (netb   vin   net_tail VSS)    tsmc18dN w=500u  l=1.8u
    Mtail  (net_tail ibn10u VSS VSS)      tsmc18dN w=20u   l=1.8u
    Pf1    (netc   ibn10u VDD   VDD)      tsmc18dP w=60u   l=1.8u
    Pf2    (netd   ibn10u VDD   VDD)      tsmc18dP w=60u   l=1.8u
    Pf3    (netc   netc   VDD   VDD)      tsmc18dP w=120u  l=1.8u
    Pf4    (net_drive netd VDD   VDD)     tsmc18dP w=120u  l=1.8u
    Pf5    (vout   net_drive VDD   VDD)   tsmc18dP w=240u  l=1.8u
ends fc_ota
// Top-level instantiation
// Library name: MP4
// Cell name: dut
// View name: schematic
I1 (net1 net2 net5 net3 net4 net6) fc_ota')
